name: Space Slugs from Planet X
description:
You play star-ship janitor Bruce Strogonoff, as you battle for your life against space slugs from Planet X aboard the SS Goulash.

Find the key card and activate the elevator to clear a level. Space slugs cannot be overcome, only delayed.

Controls:

  • WASD = Move
  • Left Click = Mop Attack
  • Right Click = Pistol
  • Mouse = Aim
  • O/P = Scale Resolution

Art:  http://twitter.com/ocddisco

Sound: https://twitter.com/actuallyCNB

Code: https://twitter.com/_johnfirmin

Jam Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/space-slugs-from-planet-x
